languages.text: Until the end of combat, strikes made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> and decrease enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, strikes made by the Bladedancer (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy Weapon Skill by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u> and decrease enemy armour and dodge by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These penalties stack.

Until the end of combat, attacks made by the Bladedancer (including the strikes made as part of Death Waltz) reduce enemy Weapon Skill by −(2 + AGI bonus / 2), and decrease enemy armour and dodge by −(2 + AGI bonus / 2)%. These penalties stack.

Until the end of combat, attacks made by the Bladedancer (including the strikes made as part of Death Waltz) reduce enemy Weapon Skill by −(2 + AGI bonus / 2), and decrease enemy armour and dodge by −(2 + AGI bonus / 2)%. These penalties stack.

Until the end of combat, attacks made by the Bladedancer (including attacks made as a part of Death Waltz) reduce enemy Weapon Skill by −(2 + AGI bonus / 2) and decrease enemy armour and dodge by −(2 + AGI bonus / 2)%. These penalties stack.

Until the end of combat, strikes made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> and decrease enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, los impactos del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} (incluyendo los ataques realizados como parte de {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Vals de la muerte{/g}) reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del objetivo en −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} en −<u>(2 + bonificación por AGI / 2)</u> %. Estas {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} son acumulativas.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, strikes made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> and decrease enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, los impactos del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} (incluyendo los ataques realizados como parte de {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Vals de la muerte{/g}) reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del objetivo en −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} en −<u>(2 + bonificación por AGI / 2)</u> %. Estas {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} son acumulativas.

languages.text: 戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が行う攻撃（{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死のワルツ{/g}の一部として行う攻撃を含む）は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}を−<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>減らし、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を−<u>(2 + AGIボーナス / 2)</u>%減少させる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, strikes made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> and decrease enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が行う攻撃（{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死のワルツ{/g}の一部として行う攻撃を含む）は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を−<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>減らし、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を−<u>(2 + AGIボーナス / 2)</u>%減少させる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}はスタックする。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的所有攻击（包括通过{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死亡华尔兹{/g}发动的攻击），都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低<u>（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低<u>（2+敏捷加值/2）</u>%。上述{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, strikes made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> and decrease enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的所有攻击（包括通过{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死亡华尔兹{/g}发动的攻击），都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低<u>（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>，使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低<u>（2+敏捷加值/2）</u>%。上述{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les coups portés par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} (y compris les attaques de {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g}) réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} des ennemis de <u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u>, ainsi que leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de −<u>(2 + bonus d'AGI / 2)</u> %. Ces {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} sont cumulables.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, strikes made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} (including attacks made as a part of {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}) reduce enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> and decrease enemy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −<u>(2 + AGI bonus / 2)</u>%. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les coups portés par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} (y compris les attaques de {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g}) réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} des ennemis de <u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u>, ainsi que leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de −<u>(2 + bonus d'AGI / 2)</u> %. Ces {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} sont cumulables.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verringern Schläge des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} (einschließlich Angriffe im Rahmen von {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Todeswalzer{/g}) die gegnerische {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} um −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> sowie die gegnerische {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} um −<u>(2 + BEW-Bonus / 2)</u> %. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} werden gestapelt.

These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verringern Schläge des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} (einschließlich Angriffe im Rahmen von {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Todeswalzer{/g}) die gegnerische {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} um −<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> sowie die gegnerische {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} um −<u>(2 + BEW-Bonus / 2)</u> %. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} werden gestapelt.

languages.text: До конца боя атаки {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} (включая атаки в составе {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Вальса смерти{/g}) уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} противника на <u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u>, а также {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника на <u>(2 + бонус ЛВК / 2)</u>%. Эти {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} суммируются.

These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} stack.

До конца боя атаки {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} (включая атаки в составе {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Вальса смерти{/g}) уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} противника на <u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u>, а также {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника на <u>(2 + бонус ЛВК / 2)</u>%. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g} tarafından yapılan saldırılar ({g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Ölüm Valsi'nin{/g} parçası olarak yapılanlar da dâhil), düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliğini <u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} / 2)</u> kadar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerlerine ise <u>%(2 + ÇEV bonusu / 2)</u> kadar azaltır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanları{/g} üst üste birikebilir.
